column4: hi there, i need help. I downloaded the iso file of ubuntu and then i burn it on a cd.. What i have to do now?
sorry i miss something, when i press F9 to start from internal cd/dvd device, after 5 seconds keeps start windows vista
how can i solve my problem?
roughly how many files are on the disc you burned.  You didn't just burn the iso as a file onto the disc did you?
